DOC.brief_title: The Effects Ficus Carica Improvement Bowl Movements Female Volunteer With Functional Constipation
DOC.criteria: Subjects female volunteer ( unmarried ) , 19~40 year Subject functional constipation ROME IIII criterion Subject 36 hour colonic transit time Subject must provide write informed consent participate study Subject history evidence clinically significant gastrointestinal , anorectal , hepatic , renal , neurological , pulmonary , endocrine , blood tumor , psychiatric , Cardiovascular disease Subjects gastrointestinal ( GI ) disease ( Crohn 's disease , etc . ) would increase influence absorbance medication GI surgery exclude appendectomy hernia surgery Subject uterine fibroid ultrasonography Subject pregnant , plan become pregnant , breastfeeding Subjects childbearing potential ( i.e . premenopausal , surgically sterile ) willing use medically accept contraceptive ( oral contraception ) regimen Known history moderate severe hepatic impairment ( i.e. , serum ALT > 1.5×ULN , AST > 1.5×ULN ) Subjects uncontrolled hypotension ( indicated sit systolic blood pressure ≤ 95 mmHg diastolic blood pressure ≤ 60 mmHg measure ) hypertension ( indicated sit systolic blood pressure≥ 150 mmHg diastolic blood pressure≥ 95 mmHg measure ) vital sign measurement Subjects significant hypersensitivity Ficus carica Subjects receive certain medication cause alteration bowel movement within past 2weeks prior first administration Subjects participate clinical investigation within 2 month prior first administration Subject drink constantly ( 21 units/week ) Subject Irritable bowel syndrome ROME IIII criterion Any significant condition , opinion investigator , could interfere subject 's participation compliance study ( i.e. , laboratory test others )
